sub_topic: Balancing chemical equations for inorganic compounds
message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the reaction between iron (III) oxide and carbon monoxide to produce iron metal and carbon dioxide gas?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the reaction between iron (III) oxide (Fe2O3) and carbon monoxide (CO) to produce iron metal (Fe) and carbon dioxide gas (CO2) is:

Fe2O3 + 3CO â†’ 2Fe + 3CO2
